original: **ZE_FFVII_COSMO_CANYON**
zh_trans: 最终幻想VII 宇宙峡谷

original: **Map by Headshooter.SC & HaRyDe**
zh_trans: 地图作者:Headshooter.SC & HaRyDe

original: **WARMUP ROUND**
zh_trans: 热身回合

original: **Cover here for 5 seconds before we clear this obstacle**
zh_trans: 5秒后我会为你们清除障碍

original: **Zombie Confuse has been picked up**
zh_trans: 僵尸致盲已被拾取

original: **NORMAL MODE**
zh_trans: 普通模式

original: [Cloud] Hmm.. Seems like the engines are broken.. We are stuck in the middle of this desert!
zh_trans: 【克劳德】emmm, 飞船的引擎爆炸了，我们被困住了

original: [Red-XIII] Do not worry. I know this place.. I was born in here..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】不用担心.我知道这个地方.... 是我的故乡

original: [Cloud] Well.. That means.. That we can find some staff to make our ship working again.. Right?
zh_trans: 【克劳德】或许..可以让本地人给我们一些修理飞船的材料

original: [Red-XIII] Of course. But I need to do something first.. I will see you in the Gi Cave.
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】那还用说吗。但是我还有一些事情要做，回头见

original: [Red-XIII] There I will give you all the stuff you need.
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】 如果你有什么需求的话可以尽管提出来

original: [Cloud] No problem. I will wait for you in there..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】没有问题，我到时候联络你

original: **A player has picked up WIND materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【风】

original: **A player has picked up BIO materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【毒】

original: **We are almost at Cosmo Canyon**
zh_trans: 上面就是宇宙峡谷了

original: **Defend here for 25 seconds until the gates open**
zh_trans: 25秒后大门打开

original: **Gates are open. Welcome to Cosmo Canyon**
zh_trans: 宇宙峡谷的大门打开了

original: **A player has picked up GRAVITY materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【黑洞】

original: **The barman will open the door in 5 seconds**
zh_trans: 酒馆大门5秒后会打开

original: **Zombies are coming. Defend Cosmo Bar for 25 seconds before we open the back door**
zh_trans: 僵尸正在进攻，你必须抵御僵尸25秒

original: **A player has picked up FIRE materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【火焰】

original: **5 SECONDS LEFT**
zh_trans: 5秒

original: **FALL BACK**
zh_trans: 门开了

original: **THE EXPLOSIVE WILL BLOW UP THE ROCK IN 25 SECONDS**
zh_trans: 正在给岩石安装C4，将在25后爆炸

original: **A player has picked up SLEEP materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【昏睡红茶】

original: **The gates will open in 25 seconds**
zh_trans: 25秒后大门打开

original: **The gates of gi cave will open in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: 15秒后打开通向基族洞穴的大门

original: **Wait until something happens**
zh_trans: 等待某些事情发生

original: **The gi gate will open in 35 seconds**
zh_trans: 35秒后大门打开

original: [Cloud] Ay.. There you are!
zh_trans: 【克劳德】你来了

original: [Red-XIII] Yes. They helped me a lot. Did you ask for that? This is for you..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】他们帮了我很多。是你跟他们说的吗？ 这个是给你的

original: [Cloud] Thanks. But one question.. What did we forget here?
zh_trans: 【克劳德】嗯，但是我有一个问题，为什么我们要在这里碰头？

original: [Red-XIII] This is the ancient cave of spirits.. Far ago my father was fighting with Gi Nattak..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】 这里是基族洞穴....我的父亲曾经在这里跟基 纳塔克战斗过....

original: [Red-XIII] And he sacrificed himself in order to save the Cosmo Canyon..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】为了保护峡谷中的人们，我的父亲牺牲了....

original: [Cloud] Oh what a pity..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】 深感遗憾

original: [Red-XIII] Do not bring this close to your heart.. He died like a hero and I hope that you guys can defeat him..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】请不要把这件事放在心上...它对于我来说是个英雄..同时我也希望你们可以帮助我打倒基 纳塔克

original: [Cloud] Yea I wish you good luck. When you end with him I go repair our airship..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】嗯，武运昌隆，等处理完这些事后，我再去修理我们的飞船

original: **GRENADES DO A LOT OF DAMAGE. USE THEM!**
zh_trans: 手雷可以对boss造成更多伤害

original: **SOME OF YOUR ITEMS CAN DAMAGE THE BOSS**
zh_trans: 部分神器可以对boss造成伤害

original: **Gi Nattak is using poison**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了

original: **Gi Nattak is using shield**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了

original: **Gi Nattak is spawning minions. Watch out for them**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克召唤了火魂.小心他砸死你

original: **Gi Nattak is using gravity**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了

original: **Gi Nattak is using fire**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了

original: **Gi Nattak is using wind**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了

original: **A player has picked up HEAL materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【治疗】

original: **Gi Nattak is using aspil**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了”摄魂术“，快蹲下

original: **Gi Nattak is using Fire Nova!!! Get out of middle**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了“火焰新星“，快去场地边缘！

original: **Gi Nattack is escaped**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克逃跑了

original: **Now you can get out of Cave of Gi**
zh_trans: 我们现在可以离开基族洞穴了

original: **DOOR OPENS IN 40 SECONDS**
zh_trans: 大门40秒后打开

original: **10 SECONDS LEFT**
zh_trans: 还剩下10秒

original: **This is your last hold point**
zh_trans: 这是本关的最后一个守点

original: **Get on the rocks and hold 25 seconds**
zh_trans: 在石头上面抵御僵尸25秒

original: [Red-XIII] Congrats! You made it.. But seems like Gi Nattak ran away somehow.. We will defeat him next time..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】我们做到了。但似乎被基纳塔克逃走了....我们下次还会打败它的...

original: **A player has picked up EARTH materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【土】

original: **Gi Nattak has healed 300 hp**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克回复了300hp

original: **A player has picked up ELECTRO materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【电】

original: **Gi Nattak is using teleport**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了“传送”，不要乱动

original: **NORMAL mode was beaten. Unlocking HARD mode **
zh_trans: normal模式已过关，解锁hard模式

original: **HARD MODE**
zh_trans: hard模式

original: **CHEST SIDEQUEST STARTED**
zh_trans: 支线任务开启

original: **FIND ALL THE GOLDEN CHESTS TO GET A SPECIAL ITEM THAT WILL HELP YOU ON GI NATTAK**
zh_trans: 找齐所有宝箱，即可解锁不死鸟之尾

original: **A player has picked up ULTIMA materia**
zh_trans: 一位玩家拾取了【终极】

original: [Red-XIII] Hope he will not escape this time? I afraid that we could attract extra attention..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】希望这次不要给它跑了,可能会引起额外的骚动

original: [Cloud] Just in case.. I will bring the ship to the end of the canyon and will take you away..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】以防万一...我把飞船开到峡谷的尽头...

original: [Cloud] Oh sh#t. Theres a stranger right near our airship. Be careful..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】 ####? 为什么我们的飞船旁边有...人？

original: [Genesis] Due to you I found what I need.. Face your death here..
zh_trans: 【杰内西斯】多亏了你们....我找到了我需要的东西...

original: **Hard mode is beaten. Challenge yourself in EXTREME mode ! **
zh_trans: hard模式已通关，解锁extreme模式

original: **EXTREME MODE**
zh_trans: ex模式

original: [Red-XIII] That guy could summon Bahamut.. Where did he take that power?
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】那个家伙为什么有可以召唤巴哈姆特的能力？

original: [Red-XIII] Anyways we need to defeat Gi Nattak for once and for all..
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】不管怎样，我们都需要再一次击败基纳塔克，这次不能让它逃走了....

original: **The rock will explode in 25 seconds**
zh_trans: 岩石？将在25后爆炸

original: **The detonator seems to be broken**Go another way**
zh_trans: 管道好像炸了？

original: **...Are you surprised?...**
zh_trans: 你感到惊讶吗?

original: **...Didn't you expect me?...**
zh_trans: 你有想我吗？

original: **...Oh okay i'm disappearing...**
zh_trans: o 好吧，看来这是一个幽默的笑话... 我这就离开..

original: [Red-XIII] Cloud do you know that guy?
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】克劳德，你认识那个家伙吗？

original: [Cloud] This was 1st Class SOLDIER Genesis.. But what did he forget here?
zh_trans: 【克劳德】 嗯，他是神罗1st的特种兵【杰内西斯】....但是，为什么他..会在这里？

original: [Red-XIII] Possibly he needs the Gi Nattak soul.. Because it contains huge amount of power.
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】他可能要找的是基纳塔克的灵魂...因为里面蕴含的庞大的能量...

original: [Cloud] This is so bad.. Theres one of the Shinra bases nearby. I guess here we will find him.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】完了，刚好这附近有一个神罗基地，我想或许我们可以在那里找到他....

original: **Gi Nattak is using silence**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克对神器使用了“沉默”

original: [Genesis] Huh.. Did not think that you will survive..
zh_trans: 【杰內西斯】aha...没想到你会活了下来...

original: [Genesis] Anyways Gi Nattak soul is mine now and I can realize my plan.. Farewell!
zh_trans: 【杰内西斯】也没关系，基纳塔克的灵魂已经到手了,,我可以实现我的计划了,,,再会.

original: **Ifrit is defeated! Get on the airship**
zh_trans: 伊芙利特被打败了，快上飞船！

original: **GI NATTAK USES LAVA SUPERATTACK**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克让岩浆上升了！

original: **Get on the rocks to get saved!!!**
zh_trans: 快到岩石上面

original: ** EXTREME mode is beaten. Get ready for your last challenge ...**
zh_trans: ex模式已通关，解锁下一关

original: **RAGE MODE**
zh_trans: rage模式

original: **Cover here for 10 seconds before we clear this obstacle**
zh_trans: 障碍物将在10秒后爆炸

original: **The airship to Shinra will arrive in 30 seconds**
zh_trans: 带我们去神罗的飞船将在30秒后抵达

original: [Cloud] Hold on! I will take you on the airship.. And then we will go to Shinra base.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】等下，我会带你上飞船 然后前往神罗基地

original: [Cloud] Red-XIII will stay here and will help to reestablish the Village.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】赤红13就留在这里吧，帮忙重建村庄

original: **The airship is right here...**
zh_trans: 飞船就在这里...

original: **The gates will open in 30 seconds**
zh_trans: 大门将在30秒打开

original: [Cloud] Guys be careful! If Genesis is really here then it might be Jenova.. Fighting them both will not be easy..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】我们得小心，如果杰内西斯在这里的话，那么杰诺瓦也可能在这里....跟他们的战斗会变得特别困难...

original: [Cloud] Especially if he got Gi Nattak soul.. Hard to imagine how mighty he will become..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】尤其是他获得了基纳塔克的灵魂...他会变得更加强大..

original: [Cloud] If you succeed with that then we explode the base with Jenova.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】如果成功了，那么我们可以把这个神罗基地炸了

original: **Wait 5 more seconds**
zh_trans: 还剩5秒

original: **Shinra gates will open in 25 seconds**
zh_trans: 神罗的大门将在25秒后打开

original: **The gates will open in 15 seconds**
**The elevator will leave in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: 15秒后开门

original: **Genesis is defeated. Get back in the elevator**
zh_trans: 【杰内西斯】Even if the morrow is barren of promises （等到约定消殒的明天）..Nothing shall forestall my return...（必定飞舞归向君所在之地）

original: [Cloud] Really do not think that he could lose that easy.. Anyways the base will explode soon.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】神罗基地就要爆炸了，我们该跑路了

original: [Cloud] See you on the top evacuation point.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】神罗基地的顶层停机坪吧..

original: **The power is lost. Defend until the emergency generators are on**
zh_trans: 房间停电了，我们得撑到电力恢复..

original: **We got the power. The gates will open in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: 干得好！电力恢复了，大门还有15秒打开

original: ** Nades do more damage. **
zh_trans: 【杰内西斯】这份从容，你还能保持到什么时候呢..

original: **You have beaten Cosmo Canyon!! Congratulations !! **
zh_trans: 恭喜你，征服了宇宙峡谷！

original: [Cloud] Nice job! I hope that we are done with them for once and for all. The next stop is Cosmo Canyon..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】 干得好！我们该回到宇宙峡谷了...

original: **ZM MODE**
zh_trans: 僵尸感染模式

original: **Map has been beaten. Find a place to defend yourself on and keep the zombies away from it**
zh_trans: 地图已通关.我们找个地方防守，保护好自己

original: [Red-XIII] Cosmo Canyon is almost back to normal. The observatory still needs to be repaired.
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】宇宙峡谷已经重建的差不多了.天文台也快修好了.

original: [Cloud] These guys could defeat Genesis and Jenova. I think that is one problem solved for us.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】这些家伙居然可以打败杰内西斯和杰诺瓦..

original: [Red-XIII] I cannot find enough words to thank them for all... they did a really good job.
zh_trans: 【赤红-13】我无法用语言来表述我现在的心情...谢谢你们所做的一切...

original: [Red-XIII] I guess we can rest for a bit here and keep going then.. What do you think?
zh_trans: [赤红-13]我想我们可以在这里休整一会...然后继续前进..你意下如何 ？

original: [Cloud] Sounds good.. we need to keep moving. We still have to stop Sephiroth.. So we still have a lot to do.
zh_trans: 【克劳德】听起来很不错，我们还需要继续前进..我们还得击败萨菲罗斯...我们还有很多的事要做...

original: [Cloud] So lets start from the Temple of the Ancients..
zh_trans: 【克劳德】下一站是古代种神殿..

original: **2 MINUTES LEFT!**
zh_trans: 还有2分钟

original: **Zombie cactus has been picked up**
zh_trans: 仙人掌已被拾取

original: **1 MINUTES LEFT!**
zh_trans: 还剩1分钟

original: **30 SECONDS LEFT!**
**15 SECONDS LEFT!**
**Teleporting humans to the Observatory**
zh_trans: 所有人类将被传送到天文台

original: **Defend here for 15 seconds before the platform leaves**
zh_trans: 防守最后15秒直至平台上升

original: **The platform is leaving**
zh_trans: 平台即将上升

original: **WINNERS GONNA CHANGE NEXT STAGE**
zh_trans: 选择你的下一个关卡

original: **THE WINNERS HAD SELECTED THE MODE**
zh_trans: 有人已经选择了模式

original: **GI NATTAK IS USING ULTIMA. KILL HIM FASTER!!**
zh_trans: 基纳塔克使用了终极，快击败它！
